title: Episode 1: Russell Dickerson
description:
Welcome to episode one of Coffee with Kailey! Each Wednesday, Kailey invites everyone to sit down and have coffee with her and her friends. As a touring wife and mother, Kailey gets to the heart of the matter with the people that matter most to her. She and her friends will catch up over a cup of coffee, sharing intimate stories of their lives. So, come share a cup and listen as they open up in this twelve episode podcast.

Today, Kailey sits down with her husband and multiplatinum singer/songwriter, Russell Dickerson to share their dating and marriage story and life together as the Dickersons.

Thanks to our sponsors in this episode!

Stephanie May Wilson: To pick up a copy of her beautiful keepsake prayer journal, just head to StephanieMayWilson.com, and if you use promo code, KAILEY, it'll give you 15% off.

Modern Fertility: Modern Fertility is offering our listeners $20 off the test when you go to ModernFertility.com/kailey.

Cru: For only $21 a month, you can provide three people with Bibles each and every month.  When you sign up to provide 3 Bibles with a monthly gift of $21, as a thank you, Cru will provide meals to five hungry families through their humanitarian aid ministry. Simply text COFFEE to 71326 to help today or visit give.cru.org/CoffeeWithKailey. Message and data rates may apply.

Cru’s Terms of Use – https://www.cru.org/us/en/about/terms-of-use.html  
Cru’s Privacy Policy – https://www.cru.org/us/en/about/privacy.html
